document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Shrine, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">made </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Taper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">shine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Madonna </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">dim, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Regard </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Nun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">knowest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Wo </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Needless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Grace </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">next </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">heal? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">looks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">harder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">skill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">easy, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Grant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">knowest, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">though, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Why </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Only a shrine but mine
